sourcesContent: import{isDesignToken as t,cssNameTransform as n}from"@aws-amplify/ui";import{stylePropsToThemeKeys as r}from"./constants.js";const o=t=>"string"==typeof t&&t.length>0,e=t=>"function"==typeof t,l=t=>"string"==typeof t&&0===t.length,i=t=>null==t||l(t),s=(t,n)=>{const r=n-t+1;return Array.from({length:r},((n,r)=>r+t))},f=(t,n)=>n?`${t}--${n}`:null,p=(t,n,r)=>r?`${t}--${n}`:null,u=(o,e,l)=>{if("string"!=typeof e)return e;if(e.includes(" "))return e.split(" ").map((t=>u(o,t,l))).join(" ");const i=e.split("."),s=r[o];let f=l[s];for(let t=0;t<i.length&&f;t++)f=f[i[t]];return t(f)?`var(--${n({path:[r[o],...i]})})`:e};export{f as classNameModifier,p as classNameModifierByFlag,u as getCSSVariableIfValueIsThemeKey,s as getConsecutiveIntArray,l as isEmptyString,e as isFunction,i as isNullOrEmptyString,o as strHasLength};
